name: Greeting
message: Hello {name}! Hope you're doing well today.

name: Meeting Reminder
message: Hi {name}, this is a reminder for our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Please confirm your attendance.

name: Payment Reminder
message: Dear {name}, this is a friendly reminder that your payment is due. Please process it at your earliest convenience. Thank you!

name: Thank You
message: Thank you {name} for your support! We really appreciate it.

name: Promotion
message: Hi {name}! We have an exclusive offer just for you. Get 20% off on all products this week. Don't miss out!
